text: Egha nan nɨghnɨzir bar ekiam kamakɨn, kɨ arazir derazir puvatɨzitam damuva an aghumsɨzim inian kogham. Puvatɨ. Nan nɨghnɨzim kamakɨn, datɨrɨghɨn ko gɨn kɨ atiatingan koghɨva tugh gavgavighɨva arazir aghuibara damuam, kɨ zurara ami moghɨn. Ezɨ kɨ angamra ikiam o kɨ aremegham, bizir kɨ amiba bar, ziar ekiam Krais danɨngam.
